summary:
Leather based outfit for the CBBE v3 body.
Body, headgear, gloves and boots, all craftable.
They have two different coloring named Dust and Snow.
(Refer to images for details).
descriptionHtml:
Leather based outfit for the CBBE v3 body.
Body, headgear, gloves and boots, all craftable.

They have two different coloring named Dust and Snow.
(Refer to images for details).

The only reason this was made is that I wanted to learn Blender :D

Downloaded file include readme and images.

Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Based off the CBBE v3 body [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?] (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?) [/url]
- Weight 0 support only.
- Sort of not lore friendly
- I'm neither a modeller or texture artist and made this just for fun. (If you don't like it, don't use it).
- For the boots you need SKSE, SkyUI and HDT HH system !!!
(SKSE):[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] (http://skse.silverlock.org/) [/url]
(SkyUI):[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?) [/url]
(HDT HH):[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?) [/url]
- The boots don't have HDT HH implemented, use custom / override options instead. (Set height to 5.5 or close to it).
- There are some minor clipping issue with parts of the model.
- There will also be some high glow / shine, mostly in high light indoor area.
- The headgear (masks) are classified as Circlets and not helmets !

Video review by vatiwah:
[youtube]flee19c0oDs[/youtube]

Item list - weight - rating - value - ID
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spearhead Catsuit (Dust) - 8 - 8 - 500 - xx000D62
Spearhead Catsuit (Snow) - 8 - 8 - 500 - xx0012c7
Spearhead Catsuit Complete (Dust) - 12 - 10 - 800 - xx00182a
Spearhead Catsuit Complete (Snow) - 12 - 10 - 800 - xx001d8e
Spearhead Gloves (Dust) - 1 - 2 - 50 - xx002855
Spearhead Gloves (Snow) - 1 - 2 - 50 - xx002db9
Spearhead Gloves Cut (Dust) - 1 - 2 - 50 - xx00331d
Spearhead Gloves Cut (Snow) - 1 - 2 - 50 - xx003de5
Spearhead Gloves Complete (Dust) - 1 - 3 - 80 - xx003881
Spearhead Gloves Complete (Snow) - 1 - 3 - 80 - xx003de7
Spearhead Gloves Cut Complete (Dust) - 1 - 3 - 80 - xx003de9
Spearhead Gloves Cut Complete (Snow) - 1 - 3 - 80 - xx003deb
Spearhead Mask Silence (Dust) - 1 - 2 - 40 - xx00434e
Spearhead Mask Silence (Snow) - 1 - 2 - 40 - xx004e15
Spearhead Mask Blind (Dust) - 1 - 2 - 40 - xx004e17
Spearhead Mask Blind (Snow) - 1 - 2 - 40 - xx004e19
Spearhead Mask Sense (Dust) - 1 - 2 - 70 - xx004e1b
Spearhead Mask Sense (Snow) - 1 - 2 - 70 - xx004e1d
Spearhead Boots (Dust) - 3 - 2 - 120 - xx005380
Spearhead Boots (Snow) - 3 - 2 - 120 - xx0058e5
Spearhead Boots Complete (Dust) - 4 - 3 - 160 - xx0058e7
Spearhead Boots Complete (Snow) - 4 - 3 - 160 - xx0058e9

(Replace xx with this mod number order).


================================================================================
Manuall Installation
================================================================================

Copy the BBD_CatsuitSpearhead.esp and BBD_CatsuitSpearhead.bsa and place it in
the Skyrim data folder.
(C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimdata)
Make sure it is selected during load.
